      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Site.getReadLock(Transaction trans, java.lang.String variable)
      the transaction takes the read lock on the variable
      void Site.getWriteLock(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String variable)
      transaction takes the write lock on the variable
      boolean Site.isWriteLockAvailable(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String variable)
      checks if a write lock can be taken by the transaction on the variable
      boolean Site.isWriteLockTaken(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String variable)
      returns true if transaction already has a write lock on the variable false otherwise
      boolean Site.transactionWaits(Transaction transaction, java.lang.String variable)
      checks if a transaction should wait for the other transaction to finish or it should abort
